Description: Intermediate Landsat NDVI phenology dataset (â‰¥10 obs) with vegetation classification, used to generate Figure S4 (histogram comparing cross-calibrated and non-cross-calibrated datasets)
Data_Source_Origin: GEE, downloaded and processed using LandsatTS R package
Variables: sample.id, year, latitude, longitude, NVC1, IMP1, NVC0, NVCs, Vegetation_Group, n.obs, ndvi.gs.avg, ndvi.gs.med, ndvi.gs.q90, ndvi.max, ndvi.max.lwr, ndvi.max.upr, ndvi.max.doy
Units: NDVI: unitless (-1 to 1 scale); Latitude/Longitude: decimal degrees; doy: day of year
Notes: Not the final dataset — used for cross-calibration comparison (Figure S4)

Description: Intermediate Landsat NDVI phenology dataset (â‰¥10 obs) without cross-calibration, used in Figure S4
Data_Source_Origin: GEE, downloaded and processed using LandsatTS R package
Variables: sample.id, year, latitude, longitude, n.obs, ndvi.gs.avg, ndvi.gs.med, ndvi.gs.q90, ndvi.max, ndvi.max.lwr, ndvi.max.upr, ndvi.max.doy
Units: NDVI: unitless (-1 to 1 scale); Latitude/Longitude: decimal degrees; doy: day of year

Description: Landsat NDVI dataset used for Landsat-based statistical models
Data_Source_Origin: GEE, downloaded and processed using LandsatTS package; MODIS MCD12Q2 phenology product, downloaded and processed using MODISTools R package
Variables: sample.id, year, latitude, longitude, NVC1, IMP1, NVC0, NVCs, Vegetation_Group, n.obs, ndvi.gs.avg, ndvi.gs.med, ndvi.gs.q90, ndvi.max, ndvi.max.lwr, ndvi.max.upr, ndvi.max.doy
Units: NDVI: unitless (-1 to 1 scale); Latitude/Longitude: decimal degrees; doy: day of year
Notes: Used in Landsat NDVI model analyses

Description: MODIS EVI phenology dataset with vegetation type assignments, used for MODIS-based models
Variables: xllcorner, yllcorner, cellsize, nrows, ncols, latitude, longitude, site, product, start, end, complete, modis_date, calendar_date, tile, proc_date, pixel, Vegetation_Code, Vegetation_Group, EVI_Amplitude, EVI_Minimum, EVI_Area, Dormancy, Greenup, MidGreenup, MidGreendown, Maturity, Senescence, EVI_Maximum
Units: EVI: unitless (-1 to 1 scale); Phenology dates in DOY
Notes: Used in MODIS EVI model analyses

Description: Combined Landsat NDVI and MODIS EVI phenology dataset for cross-sensor model comparisons
Data_Source_Origin: Merged Landsat NDVI metrics with MODIS MCD12Q2 phenology metrics
Variables: MODIS columns (see MCD12Q2_MasterFile_Inc_VegTypes_2) + year, lat, long, grid_id, ndvi_max, ndvi_max_doy
Units: NDVI/EVI: unitless (-1 to 1 scale); lat/long: decimal degrees; doy: day of year
Notes: Used in comparisons between NDVI and EVI; Landsat data has been downscaled to MODIS (500 m) resolution

Description: Field-measured average live standing crop (Julyâ€“August) in selected vegetation plots
Data_Source_Origin: Field data from the Rum red deer study
Units: Standing crop: g/m²; n_mon: number of monthls used in measurement
